00035 
00036 #include "contiki-conf.h"
00037 #include "dev/leds.h"
00038 #include "mc1322x.h"
00039 #include "board.h"
00040 
00041 #define LED_ARCH_RED   GPIO_LED_RED
00042 #define LED_ARCH_GREEN GPIO_LED_GREEN
00043 #define LED_ARCH_BLUE  GPIO_LED_BLUE
00044 
00045 void leds_arch_init(void)
00046 {
00047         /* set gpio func_sel to gpio (3) */
00048         GPIO->FUNC_SEL.LED_ARCH_RED = 3;
00049         GPIO->FUNC_SEL.LED_ARCH_GREEN = 3;
00050         GPIO->FUNC_SEL.LED_ARCH_BLUE = 3;
00051 
00052         /* set led gpios to output */
00053         GPIO->PAD_DIR.LED_ARCH_RED = 1;
00054         GPIO->PAD_DIR.LED_ARCH_GREEN = 1;
00055         GPIO->PAD_DIR.LED_ARCH_BLUE = 1;
00056 }
00057 
00058 unsigned char leds_arch_get(void)
00059 {
00060 
00061         return ((GPIO->DATA.LED_ARCH_RED) ? 0 : LEDS_RED)
00062                 | ((GPIO->DATA.LED_ARCH_GREEN) ? 0 : LEDS_GREEN)
00063                 | ((GPIO->DATA.LED_ARCH_BLUE) ? 0 : LEDS_BLUE);
00064 
00065 }
00066 
00067 void leds_arch_set(unsigned char leds)
00068 {
00069         if(leds & LEDS_RED)   { GPIO->DATA.LED_ARCH_RED = 1;   } else { gpio_reset(LED_ARCH_RED);   } 
00070         if(leds & LEDS_GREEN) { gpio_set(LED_ARCH_GREEN); } else { gpio_reset(LED_ARCH_GREEN); } 
00071         if(leds & LEDS_BLUE)  { gpio_set(LED_ARCH_BLUE);  } else { gpio_reset(LED_ARCH_BLUE);  }  
00072 }
00073
